articles.description: The U.S. embassy urged Americans to depart Ukraine "now" citing concerns that Russia will increase missile strikes. Latest updates.
articles.content:
Estonian Foreign Affairs Minister Urmas Reinsalu dismissed as a "provocation" the Kremlin's claims that the perpetrator of a deadly car bombing outside Moscow had fled to Estonia.

articles.description: The US government is urging Americans in Ukraine to leave the country immediately, warning that Russia is stepping up efforts to launch attacks on civilian infrastructure and government facilities ahead of Ukrainian independence day.
